name: SMD Logistics
goal: SMD Logistics AB distributes foremost tobacco products for the Swedish market. SMD Logistics AB has two distribution centrals, one in Stockholm and another one in Göteborg, Stockholm. All major tobacco actors are costumers of SMD Logistics AB. SMD AB also distributes Swedish Match snus in Norway, as well as other products (such as non-prescription drugs) top the Swedish market. SMD Logistics AB's headquarter is placed in Stockholm.
